    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_WORKERS

        public static final int DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_WORKERS
        The number of Worker threads initialized on an Android phone. You can override this behavior by calling PlatformUtils.setNumberOfWorkers() at program startup.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

        Parameters:

      • doNotifyDestroyed

        protected void doNotifyDestroyed()
        End the Android Activity class. This will cause the phone to remove the program from the display and free resources. Do not call this automatically. It is called for you when the user navigates to another Activity, or asynchronously after a slight delay when you call Worker.shutdown() to terminate the program.
        Specified by:
        doNotifyDestroyed in class PlatformUtils
